system.description:
Your skill at ferreting out supernatural threats grows, allowing you to find ever more insidious threats. You gain the following benefits:

  • You have advantage on all saving throws against spells of the Illusion and Enchantment schools. 

  • Your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.01szspr1nunp0lql]{Divine Sense} now detects the presence of any creature with an alignment trait and reveals that alignment to you. 

  • The range of your Divine Sense increases to 50 feet.

  • You gain an expertise die on Insight, Investigation, Arcana, Medicine, and Perception checks to determine if a creature’s actions are being controlled by another creature (such as via a parasite, possession, or a dominating spell or effect). The same applies when assessing the remains of a dead creature, up to 48 hours after death. The maximum expertise die size for such checks is a d12 for you.

  • You are continuously surrounded by a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.i0o4xqqd86vdkwwu]{Zone of Truth} effect. This effect is active as long as you are conscious and alive, but does not affect you. It emits a magical aura that can be detected with @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.kaye34nheyrit487]{Detect Magic} and similar effects, and can be suppressed by an antimagic field.
